titleStmt.title: Politicaster or, a comical discourse, in answer unto Mr. Wren's book, intituled, Monarchy asserted, against Mr. Harrington's Oceana. / By J.H.
titleStmt.author: Harrington, James, 1611-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for Henry Fletcher, at the three Gilt Cups in Pauls Churchyard, near the west-end,
